text: Cussons is an English surname which may refer to: == People == * Alexander Stockton Cussons (1914–1986), British soap manufacturer * Alexander Tom Cussons (1875–1951), British soap manufacturer * Leslie Cussons (1907–1963), British soap manufacturer * Sheila Cussons (1922–2004), South African poet * Thomas Tomlinson Cussons (1838–1927), British chemist == Other uses == * PZ Cussons, a British-based soap manufacturing company ** PZ Cussons Ghana ** PZ Cussons Nigeria Plc == See also == * Cusson (disambiguation)
title: Cussons
